data.meta_site_name: Larry Miller Obituary | June 10, 2023 | Brust Funeral Home - Sullivan, IN
data.text:
Larry G. Miller “Squeek”, 56, of Sullivan, IN went to be with the Lord Saturday, June 10, 2023.

He was born in Chicago, IL March 23, 1967, the son of Donald Miller and Donna Hamilton Miller.

Larry was employed at Raybestos Power Train in Sullivan, IN.

He was preceded in death by his parents, his sister Holly Miller, and a grandson, Jayden.

He is survived by his wife, Brenda Miller, two sons, Artie Southwood (Tonya of Sullivan, IN, Travis Southwood (Jessy) of Terre Haute, IN, three daughters, Nicole Tomlinson of Dugger, IN Brittany Baxley (Joseph) of Linton, IN, and Brittany Meek (Charles) of Clinton, IN, a brother, Alonzo Miller of Montana, two sisters, Rhonda Monroe (Roy) of Sullivan, Amanda Miller of Vincennes IN, 13 grandchildren, Levi Southwood, Austin Southwood, Sierra Southwood (Brandon Amstutz), Mason Southwood, Brady Southwood, Maxwell Taft, KyAnn Taft, Dalton Taft, Jayden, Cole, Zeppelynn Tomlinson, Elisha and Jaiden Baxley, 4 great grandchildren, Jayden Southwood, Easton Southwood, Jinsen Southwood and Khaleesi Southwood.

Funeral services will be at 1:00PM Wednesday, June 14, 2023, at Brust Funeral Home with Rev. Erich Blevins officiating. Visitation will be from 11:00AM until services Wednesday.
